AND memberId = #{memberId}

SELECT mem.memberId , mem.memberName , mem.nickName , mem.phone , mem.email , mem.gender , ord.orderNumber , ord.productName , ord.paymentDate FROM members mem , (SELECT orderNumber, productName, paymentDate, memberId , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY memberId ORDER BY paymentDate DESC, orderNumber DESC) RANK FROM orders ) ord WHERE mem.memberId = ord.memberId
